description: Unique internal identifier for the datatype record; serves as the table’s primary key and join key.
Business-facing name of the datatype definition used in configuration, selection lists, and UI displays.
Narrative explanation of the datatype’s purpose, usage, or constraints within the maintenance application.
Internal logical or enum type name linked to this datatype, referenced by application logic and integrations.
Underlying runtime data type used to store values for this definition (for example, a .NET primitive).
Boolean indicating whether the datatype is a bitwise flags enumeration that supports combining multiple options.
